testsuite.name: com.mockcompany.webapp.controller.SearchControllerSpec

testcase.name: search will return an item that matches the name of the product

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
results.contains(item1) | | | [] false ProductItem{id=11, name='Will Match', description='This is a good item', cost=100, image=''}

testcase.name: search will return multiple items when there are matches in the name

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
results.contains(item1) | | | [] false ProductItem{id=13, name='Will Match', description='This is a good item', cost=100, image=''}

testcase.name: search is case insensitive

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
results.contains(item1) | | | [] false ProductItem{id=16, name='Will Match', description='This is a good item', cost=100, image=''}

testcase.name: search will return an item that matches the description of the product

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
results.contains(item1) | | | [] false ProductItem{id=18, name='Will Match', description='This is a good item', cost=100, image=''}

testcase.name: search will return multiple items when there are matches in the description

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
results.contains(item1) | | | [] false ProductItem{id=20, name='Will Match', description='This is a good item', cost=100, image=''}

testcase.name: search will return items if name or description match the search

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
results.contains(item1) // Matches Will on name | | | [] false ProductItem{id=23, name='Will Match', description='This is a good item', cost=100, image=''}

testcase.name: search will only match exactly on name or description when quotes are used

failure.message:
Condition not satisfied:
results.contains(item1) // Matches on name | | | [] false ProductItem{id=26, name='Will Match', description='This is a good item', cost=100, image=''}
